title: App notifications are now activated
content: From now on you will receive app notifications from your community. Currently, this only works for Android. The service is free of trackers and works without Google's Push-Notification service.

title: Last Chance to Register for Gathering
content: Today is the last chance to register for the gatherings of the comming cycle. Already the day after tomorrow you can collect the community income.

title: Reminder: Gathering is held Tomorrow Noon
content: Friendly reminder, tomorrow noon the gathering of the comming cycle will take place. If you registered for it, make sure you can attend.

title: Reminder: Gathering Today at Noon
content: Later today the gathering will take place. Check in the app to which location you were assigned. See you later!

title: Registrations are Open
content: Registration for the next cycle's gathering are open. Register today and plan your attendance a week form today.
